Reference

Fundamentals

These components must be included in every ggip plot.

coord_ip()

Coordinate system for IP data

theme_ip_light() theme_ip_dark()

Themes for IP data

Layers

These IP-specific layers support common use cases.

stat_summary_address()

Summarize IP addresses on a heatmap

geom_hilbert_outline()

Hilbert curve outline

Internal functions

These functions are exposed to support use cases beyond ggplot2.

address_to_cartesian() network_to_cartesian()

Map IP data to Cartesian coordinates
